Events that occurred on 20 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1934 – Artist Heinz Edelmann is born.
2012 – Wagner and Tolkien: Mythmakers is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Sauron attacks Osgiliath. Boromir and Faramir defend the bridge till its destruction.
About the same time Thranduil is attacked and Gollum escapes. The War of the Ring begins.
T.A. 3019:
New Moon[1]
